title: Nusa penida island, bali, indonesia
description: Nusa Penida is an island located near the southeastern Indonesian island of Bali and a district of Klungkung Regency that includes the neighbouring small island of Nusa Lembongan and twelve even smaller islands.

title: Baan Tai Beach, Koh Samui, Thailand
description: Baan Tai is a small beach, unknown to general public. It is even seldom marked on maps. But those in the know call it a secret paradise corner of Koh Samui.

title: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: Kuala Lumpur is the capital of Malaysia. Its modern skyline is dominated by the 451m-tall Petronas Twin Towers, a pair of glass-and-steel-clad skyscrapers with Islamic motifs.
